verses.verse: On that <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1831>went<s%> out of the <S%G3614>house,<s%> and was <S%G2521>sitting<s%> by the <S%G2281>sea.<s%>

And <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G4863>gathered<s%> to Him, <S%G5620>so<s%> that He <S%G1684>got<s%> into a <S%G4143>boat<s%> and <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G2521>down,<s%> and the <S%G3956>whole<s%> <S%G3793>multitude<s%> was <S%G2476>standing<s%> on the <S%G123>beach.<s%>

And He <S%G2980>spoke<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4183>things<s%> to them in <S%G3850>parables,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2400>"Behold,<s%> the <S%G4687>sower<s%> <S%G1831>went<s%> out to <S%G4687>sow;<s%>

and as he <S%G4687>sowed,<s%> <S%G3739>some<s%> <S%G3303><s%> [seeds] <S%G4098>fell<s%> <S%G3844>beside<s%> the <S%G3598>road,<s%> and the <S%G4071>birds<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G2719>ate<s%> them up.

"And <S%G243>others<s%> <S%G4098>fell<s%> upon the <S%G4075>rocky<s%> places, <S%G3699>where<s%> they did not <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G1093>soil;<s%> and <S%G2112>immediately<s%> they <S%G1816>sprang<s%> up, <S%G1223>because<s%> they <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G899>depth<s%> of <S%G1093>soil.<s%>

"But when the <S%G2246>sun<s%> had <S%G393>risen,<s%> they were <S%G2739>scorched;<s%> and <S%G1223>because<s%> they <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G4491>root,<s%> they <S%G3583>withered<s%> <S%G3583>away.<s%>
"And <S%G243>others<s%> <S%G4098>fell<s%> <S%G1909>among<s%> the <S%G173>thorns,<s%> and the <S%G173>thorns<s%> <S%G305>came<s%> up and <S%G638>choked<s%> them out.

"And <S%G243>others<s%> <S%G4098>fell<s%> on the <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G1093>soil,<s%> and <S%G1325>yielded<s%> a <S%G2590>crop,<s%> <S%G3739>some<s%> <S%G3303><s%> a <S%G1540>hundredfold,<s%> <S%G3739>some<s%> <S%G1835>sixty,<s%> and <S%G3739>some<s%> <S%G5144>thirty.<s%>
"He who <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G3775>ears,<s%> let him <S%G191>hear.<s%>"
And the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G1223>"Why<s%> <S%G5101><s%> do You <S%G2980>speak<s%> to them in <S%G3850>parables<s%>?"

And He <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "To you it has been <S%G1325>granted<s%> to <S%G1097>know<s%> the <S%G3466>mysteries<s%> of the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> but to them it has not been <S%G1325>granted.<s%>

"For <S%G3748>whoever<s%> <S%G2192>has,<s%> to him shall [more] be <S%G1325>given,<s%> and he shall <S%G4052>have<s%> an <S%G4052>abundance;<s%> but <S%G3748>whoever<s%> does not <S%G2192>have,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> he <S%G2192>has<s%> shall be <S%G142>taken<s%> <S%G142>away<s%> from him.

<S%G1223>"Therefore<s%> <S%G3778><s%> I <S%G2980>speak<s%> to them in <S%G3850>parables;<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> while <S%G991>seeing<s%> they do not <S%G991>see,<s%> and while <S%G191>hearing<s%> they do not <S%G191>hear,<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> do they <S%G4920>understand.<s%>

"And in their case the <S%G4394>prophecy<s%> of <S%G2268>Isaiah<s%> is being <S%G378>fulfilled,<s%> which <S%G3004>says,<s%> 'You will <S%G189>keep<s%> on <S%G191>hearing,<s%> but will not <S%G4920>understand;<s%> And you will <S%G991>keep<s%> on <S%G991>seeing,<s%> but will not <S%G3708>perceive;<s%>

For the <S%G2588>heart<s%> of <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2992>people<s%> has <S%G3975>become<s%> <S%G3975>dull,<s%> And with their <S%G3775>ears<s%> they <S%G917>scarcely<s%> <S%G191>hear,<s%> And they have <S%G2576>closed<s%> their <S%G3788>eyes<s%> <S%G3379>Lest<s%> they should <S%G3708>see<s%> with their <S%G3788>eyes,<s%> And <S%G191>hear<s%> with their <S%G3775>ears,<s%> And <S%G4920>understand<s%> with their <S%G2588>heart<s%> and <S%G1994>return,<s%> And I should <S%G2390>heal<s%> them.'
"But <S%G3107>blessed<s%> are your <S%G3788>eyes,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> they <S%G991>see;<s%> and your <S%G3775>ears,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> they <S%G191>hear.<s%>

"For <S%G281>truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, that <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4396>prophets<s%> and <S%G1342>righteous<s%> <S%G1342>men<s%> <S%G1937>desired<s%> to <S%G3708>see<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> you <S%G991>see,<s%> and did not <S%G3708>see<s%> [it]; and to <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> you <S%G191>hear,<s%> and did not <S%G191>hear<s%> [it].
<S%G191>"Hear<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> the <S%G3850>parable<s%> of the <S%G4687>sower.<s%>

"When <S%G3956>anyone<s%> <S%G191>hears<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of the <S%G932>kingdom,<s%> and does not <S%G4920>understand<s%> it, the <S%G4190>evil<s%> [one] <S%G2064>comes<s%> and <S%G726>snatches<s%> <S%G726>away<s%> <S%G3588>what<s%> has been <S%G4687>sown<s%> in his <S%G2588>heart.<s%> <S%G3778>This<s%> is the one on whom seed was <S%G4687>sown<s%> <S%G3844>beside<s%> the <S%G3598>road.<s%>

"And the one on whom seed was <S%G4687>sown<s%> on the <S%G4075>rocky<s%> places, <S%G3778>this<s%> is the man who <S%G191>hears<s%> the <S%G3056>word,<s%> and <S%G2117>immediately<s%> <S%G2983>receives<s%> it with <S%G5479>joy;<s%>

<S%G1161>yet<s%> he <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> [firm] <S%G4491>root<s%> in <S%G1438>himself,<s%> but is [only] <S%G4340>temporary,<s%> and when <S%G2347>affliction<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1375>persecution<s%> <S%G1096>arises<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of the <S%G3056>word,<s%> <S%G2117>immediately<s%> he <S%G4624>falls<s%> <S%G4624>away.<s%>

"And the one on whom seed was <S%G4687>sown<s%> <S%G1519>among<s%> the <S%G173>thorns,<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> is the man who <S%G191>hears<s%> the <S%G3056>word,<s%> and the <S%G3308>worry<s%> of the <S%G165>world,<s%> and the <S%G539>deceitfulness<s%> of <S%G4149>riches<s%> <S%G4846>choke<s%> the <S%G3056>word,<s%> and it <S%G1096>becomes<s%> <S%G175>unfruitful.<s%>

"And the one on whom seed was <S%G4687>sown<s%> on the <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G1093>soil,<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> is the man who <S%G191>hears<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> and <S%G4920>understands<s%> it; <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G1211>indeed<s%> <S%G2592>bears<s%> <S%G2592>fruit,<s%> and <S%G4160>brings<s%> <S%G4160>forth,<s%> <S%G3739>some<s%> <S%G3303><s%> a <S%G1540>hundredfold,<s%> <S%G3739>some<s%> <S%G1835>sixty,<s%> and <S%G3739>some<s%> <S%G5144>thirty.<s%>"

He <S%G3908>presented<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G3850>parable<s%> to them, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "The <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> may be <S%G3666>compared<s%> to a <S%G444>man<s%> who <S%G4687>sowed<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G4690>seed<s%> in his <S%G68>field<s%>.

"But <S%G1722>while<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> were <S%G2518>sleeping,<s%> his <S%G2190>enemy<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G7080>sowed<s%> <S%G2215>tares<s%> also <S%G303>among<s%> <S%G3319><s%> the <S%G4621>wheat,<s%> and <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G565>away.<s%>

"But <S%G3753>when<s%> the <S%G5528>wheat<s%> <S%G985>sprang<s%> up and <S%G4160>bore<s%> <S%G2590>grain,<s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> the <S%G2215>tares<s%> <S%G5316>became<s%> <S%G5316>evident<s%> <S%G2532>also.<s%>

"And the <S%G1401>slaves<s%> of the <S%G3617>landowner<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G2962>'Sir,<s%> did you not <S%G4687>sow<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G4690>seed<s%> in your <S%G68>field<s%>? <S%G4159>How<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> does it <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2215>tares<s%>?'

"And he <S%G5346>said<s%> to them, 'An <S%G2190>enemy<s%> <S%G444><s%> has <S%G4160>done<s%> <S%G3778>this!<s%>' And the <S%G1401>slaves<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, 'Do you <S%G2309>want<s%> us, <S%G3767>then,<s%> to <S%G565>go<s%> and <S%G4816>gather<s%> them up?'
"But he <S%G5346>said,<s%> <S%G3756>'No;<s%> <S%G3379>lest<s%> while you are <S%G4816>gathering<s%> up the <S%G2215>tares,<s%> you may <S%G1610>root<s%> up the <S%G4621>wheat<s%> with them.

<S%G863>'Allow<s%> <S%G297>both<s%> to <S%G4885>grow<s%> <S%G4885>together<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> the <S%G2326>harvest;<s%> and in the <S%G2540>time<s%> of the <S%G2326>harvest<s%> I will <S%G3004>say<s%> to the <S%G2327>reapers,<s%> <S%G4413>"First<s%> <S%G4816>gather<s%> up the <S%G2215>tares<s%> and <S%G1210>bind<s%> them in <S%G1197>bundles<s%> to <S%G2618>burn<s%> them up; but <S%G4863>gather<s%> the <S%G4621>wheat<s%> into my <S%G596>barn.<s%>"' "

He <S%G3908>presented<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G3850>parable<s%> to them, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "The <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> is <S%G3664>like<s%> a <S%G4615>mustard<s%> <S%G2848>seed,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> and <S%G4687>sowed<s%> in his <S%G68>field;<s%>

and <S%G3739>this<s%> is <S%G3398>smaller<s%> than <S%G3956>all<s%> [other] <S%G4690>seeds;<s%> but <S%G3752>when<s%> it is <S%G837>full<s%> <S%G837>grown,<s%> it is <S%G3173>larger<s%> than the <S%G3001>garden<s%> <S%G3001>plants,<s%> and <S%G1096>becomes<s%> a <S%G1186>tree,<s%> <S%G5620>so<s%> that the <S%G4071>birds<s%> of the <S%G3772>air<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> and <S%G2681>nest<s%> in its <S%G2798>branches.<s%> "

He <S%G2980>spoke<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G3850>parable<s%> to them, "The <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> is <S%G3664>like<s%> <S%G2219>leaven,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> a <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G2983>took,<s%> and <S%G1470>hid<s%> in <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G4568>pecks<s%> of <S%G224>meal,<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> it was <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G2220>leavened.<s%>"

<S%G3956>All<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2980>spoke<s%> to the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> in <S%G3850>parables,<s%> and He did not <S%G2980>speak<s%> to them <S%G5565>without<s%> a <S%G3850>parable,<s%>

<S%G3704>so<s%> that <S%G3588>what<s%> was <S%G3004>spoken<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet<s%> might be <S%G4137>fulfilled,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "I will <S%G455>open<s%> My <S%G4750>mouth<s%> in <S%G3850>parables;<s%> I will <S%G2044>utter<s%> <S%G2928>things<s%> <S%G2928>hidden<s%> <S%G575>since<s%> the <S%G2602>foundation<s%> of the <S%G2889>world.<s%>"

<S%G5119>Then<s%> He <S%G863>left<s%> the <S%G3793>multitudes,<s%> and <S%G2064>went<s%> into the <S%G3614>house.<s%> And His <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> to Him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1285>"Explain<s%> to us the <S%G3850>parable<s%> of the <S%G2215>tares<s%> of the <S%G68>field.<s%>"
And He <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> "The one who <S%G4687>sows<s%> the <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G4690>seed<s%> is the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man,<s%>

and the <S%G68>field<s%> is the <S%G2889>world;<s%> and [as for] the <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G4690>seed,<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> are the <S%G5207>sons<s%> of the <S%G932>kingdom;<s%> and the <S%G2215>tares<s%> are the <S%G5207>sons<s%> of the <S%G4190>evil<s%> [one;]

and the <S%G2190>enemy<s%> who <S%G4687>sowed<s%> them is the <S%G1228>devil,<s%> and the <S%G2326>harvest<s%> is the <S%G4930>end<s%> of the <S%G165>age;<s%> and the <S%G2327>reapers<s%> are <S%G32>angels.<s%>

<S%G3767>"Therefore<s%> <S%G5618>just<s%> as the <S%G2215>tares<s%> are <S%G4816>gathered<s%> up and <S%G2618>burned<s%> with <S%G4442>fire,<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> shall it be at the <S%G4930>end<s%> of the <S%G165>age.<s%>

"The <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> will <S%G649>send<s%> <S%G649>forth<s%> His <S%G32>angels,<s%> and they will <S%G4816>gather<s%> out of His <S%G932>kingdom<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4625>stumbling<s%> <S%G4625>blocks,<s%> and <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G4160>commit<s%> <S%G458>lawlessness,<s%>
and will <S%G906>cast<s%> them into the <S%G2575>furnace<s%> of <S%G4442>fire;<s%> in that <S%G1563>place<s%> there shall be <S%G2805>weeping<s%> and <S%G1030>gnashing<s%> of <S%G3599>teeth.<s%>

<S%G5119>"Then<s%> the <S%G1342>righteous<s%> will <S%G1584>shine<s%> <S%G1584>forth<s%> as the <S%G2246>sun<s%> in the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of their <S%G3962>Father.<s%> He who <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G3775>ears,<s%> let him <S%G191>hear.<s%>

"The <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> is <S%G3664>like<s%> a <S%G2344>treasure<s%> <S%G2928>hidden<s%> in the <S%G68>field,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2147>found<s%> and <S%G2928>hid;<s%> and from <S%G5479>joy<s%> over it he <S%G5217>goes<s%> and <S%G4453>sells<s%> <S%G3745>all<s%> that he <S%G2192>has,<s%> and <S%G59>buys<s%> that <S%G68>field.<s%>
<S%G3825>"Again,<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> is <S%G3664>like<s%> a <S%G1713>merchant<s%> <S%G2212>seeking<s%> <S%G2570>fine<s%> <S%G3135>pearls,<s%>

and upon <S%G2147>finding<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G3135>pearl<s%> of <S%G4186>great<s%> <S%G4186>value,<s%> he <S%G565>went<s%> and <S%G4097>sold<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> that he <S%G2192>had,<s%> and <S%G59>bought<s%> it.

<S%G3825>"Again,<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> is <S%G3664>like<s%> a <S%G4522>dragnet<s%> <S%G906>cast<s%> into the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> and <S%G4863>gathering<s%> [fish] of <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G1085>kind;<s%>

and <S%G3753>when<s%> it was <S%G4137>filled,<s%> they <S%G307>drew<s%> it up on the <S%G123>beach;<s%> and they <S%G2523>sat<s%> <S%G2523>down,<s%> and <S%G4816>gathered<s%> the <S%G2570>good<s%> [fish] into <S%G7001>containers,<s%> but the <S%G4550>bad<s%> they <S%G906>threw<s%> <S%G1854>away.<s%>

<S%G3779>"So<s%> it will be at the <S%G4930>end<s%> of the <S%G165>age;<s%> the <S%G32>angels<s%> shall <S%G1831>come<s%> <S%G1831>forth,<s%> and <S%G873>take<s%> out the <S%G4190>wicked<s%> from <S%G3319>among<s%> the <S%G1342>righteous,<s%>
and will <S%G906>cast<s%> them into the <S%G2575>furnace<s%> of <S%G4442>fire;<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> shall be <S%G2805>weeping<s%> and <S%G1030>gnashing<s%> of <S%G3599>teeth.<s%>
